name: Keo and the Cosmic Crystals
description:
Keo and the Cosmic Crystals is a 2D platform game with colorful and cute graphics, featuring high difficulty and precision challenges.

In this game, you control Keo, an 8-year-old boy who, after noticing colorful crystals falling from the skies, decided to embark on an adventure in search of the mysterious Cosmic Crystals.



This game features...

• Polished gameplay and controls
• High difficulty and exciting challenges
• Fun and infectious music!
• Beautiful retro-style graphics with vibrant and colorful colors
• 60 short and enjoyable levels
• 5 themes from different and creative worlds
• 4 challenging bosses
